data.content:
Lucian: The Purifier

Release Date: August 22, 2013

Lucian, also known as the Purifier, is a highly skilled marksman in the popular online game League of Legends. With his dual pistols, he brings swift justice to those who stand in his way. Lucian's story is one of tragedy, revenge, and redemption, making him a compelling and iconic character in the game.

Background Story

Lucian hails from the city of Demacia, a kingdom known for its strong sense of justice and order. He was once a devoted sentinel of the light, fighting alongside his wife, Senna, to protect their homeland from the forces of darkness. However, their lives took a dark turn when they encountered Thresh, a sadistic and malevolent specter.

Thresh captured Senna's soul, leaving Lucian devastated and consumed by grief. Determined to rescue his beloved wife, Lucian embarked on a relentless quest to track down Thresh and put an end to his reign of terror. Armed with his twin relic pistols, the Relentless Pursuit and the Ardent Blaze, Lucian became a relentless force against the undead and all who threatened the innocent.

Throughout his journey, Lucian faced numerous challenges and encountered various allies and enemies. He formed an unlikely partnership with the rogue sorceress, Sylas, and together they fought against the oppressive rule of the mageocracy in the nation of Noxus. Lucian's unwavering determination and unyielding spirit earned him the respect and admiration of many, solidifying his place as a legendary hero in the League of Legends universe.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Lucian's playstyle revolves around his high mobility and burst damage. His abilities allow him to quickly dash in and out of combat, making him a formidable duelist and skirmisher. His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, increasing his damage output significantly.

One of Lucian's greatest strengths is his ability to kite and chase down enemies. His Relentless Pursuit ability grants him a short dash and removes the movement speed penalty when attacking, allowing him to constantly reposition himself in fights. Additionally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a straight line, dealing massive damage to anyone caught in its path.

However, Lucian also has his fair share of weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. His reliance on abilities for damage means that he can quickly run out of mana if not managed properly. Additionally, Lucian's short attack range makes him vulnerable to champions with longer ranges, forcing him to play more cautiously in certain matchups.

Lucian's Place in the Game

Lucian has been a staple pick in the League of Legends competitive scene for many years. His high burst damage and mobility make him a popular choice for players who enjoy an aggressive playstyle. Lucian's versatility allows him to be played in multiple roles, primarily as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) in the bot lane, but also as a mid laner or even a top laner in certain situations.

His ability to quickly burst down squishy targets and his strong laning phase make him a dominant force in the early game. Lucian's presence in team fights can be game-changing, as his mobility allows him to reposition and deal damage to multiple targets. Skilled Lucian players can effectively kite and outplay their opponents, making him a challenging champion to master.

Lucian's popularity is further enhanced by his wide range of skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic experience. From the classic Hired Gun Lucian to the futuristic Project: Lucian, players have the opportunity to customize their champion's appearance to suit their personal taste. On this page, you can access information and videos showcasing all the available skins for Lucian, allowing you to choose the perfect look for your Purifier.

In conclusion, Lucian is a beloved and iconic champion in the League of Legends universe. His tragic backstory, combined with his high mobility and burst damage, make him a formidable force on the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his gameplay, or simply his stylish skins, Lucian is a champion that continues to captivate players and leave a lasting impact on the game.

Lucian (Prestige Pulsefire Lucian)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: July 2020

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and vengeance, Lucian has become a fan-favorite champion among players. Over the years, Lucian has received various skins that showcase his unique style and personality. One of the most prestigious skins in his collection is the

skin.

The

skin was released in July 2020 and is available for purchase with 100 Prestige Points. This exclusive skin offers a visually stunning and upgraded version of Lucian's original Pulsefire skin. With its sleek design and golden accents, the

skin truly stands out on the battlefield.

Let's delve into the details of this remarkable skin. The

skin features a futuristic theme, incorporating advanced technology and cybernetic enhancements. Lucian's traditional dual pistols are replaced with high-tech energy blasters, emitting a vibrant blue glow. His armor is adorned with intricate circuit patterns, giving him a cutting-edge appearance.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the holographic wings that emerge from his back when he uses his ultimate ability, The Culling. These wings add an extra level of flair to Lucian's already impressive arsenal, making him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Furthermore, the skin includes unique visual and sound effects for Lucian's abilities. His Q ability, Piercing Light, fires a concentrated beam of energy, leaving behind a trail of futuristic particles. His W ability, Ardent Blaze, creates a pulsating energy field that explodes upon impact, accompanied by a distinct sound effect. The E ability, Relentless Pursuit, allows Lucian to dash forward with a burst of energy, leaving behind a trail of glowing footsteps. Finally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of energy projectiles, accompanied by a powerful sound and visual display.

Now that we have explored the

skin in detail, let's take a moment to appreciate the hero himself. Lucian's story is one of tragedy and determination. He hails from the Shadow Isles, a cursed land plagued by undead creatures and dark magic. Lucian's wife, Senna, was taken from him by the malevolent Thresh, a sadistic specter who revels in tormenting souls.

Determined to free his wife's soul and seek justice, Lucian became a relentless hunter of the undead. Armed with his twin relic pistols, he embarked on a mission to eradicate the evil that plagued the Shadow Isles. Lucian's unwavering resolve and unyielding determination make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

In the game, Lucian is classified as a marksman, excelling at dealing sustained damage from a distance. His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, making his attacks incredibly potent. His Q ability, Piercing Light, is a skillshot that damages enemies in a line, while his W ability, Ardent Blaze, reveals and damages enemies in an area. Lucian's E ability, Relentless Pursuit, allows him to dash a short distance and remove any slowing effects, providing him with excellent mobility. Finally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a target direction, dealing massive damage to enemies in its path.

Lucian's strengths lie in his high mobility, burst damage, and ability to kite enemies. His dash ability allows him to quickly reposition in team fights, making it difficult for opponents to catch him. Additionally, his passive ability and ultimate ability provide him with significant burst damage potential, allowing him to quickly eliminate squishy targets. Lucian's ability to kite enemies, thanks to his mobility and range, makes him a formidable opponent in one-on-one duels.

However, Lucian also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. Lucian's reliance on his abilities for damage means that he can struggle in extended fights where his abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, his short attack range makes him vulnerable to champions with longer ranges, as they can poke him down before he can engage.

In conclusion, Lucian's

skin is a visually stunning addition to his collection. With its futuristic design and unique effects, this skin truly embodies the essence of Lucian as the Purifier. Whether you're a fan of Lucian's lore or simply enjoy playing him on the Rift, the

skin is a must-have for any dedicated Lucian player.

For more information and videos showcasing Lucian's various appearances and skins, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Lucian on the League of Legends website. Explore the different facets of this remarkable champion and discover the perfect skin to suit your playstyle.

Lucian (Heartseeker Lucian)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: February 11, 2014

Heartseeker Lucian is a captivating skin that brings a touch of romance to the intense world of League of Legends. Released on February 11, 2014, this skin offers players a unique and visually stunning experience with its beautiful design and thematic elements.

The Heartseeker Lucian skin transforms the gunslinger into a dashing and charming hero, ready to win the hearts of both his enemies and allies. With his sleek white suit adorned with red accents, Lucian exudes confidence and style. His guns are elegantly designed with heart-shaped barrels, adding a romantic flair to his deadly arsenal.

Lucian's abilities also receive a thematic makeover with the Heartseeker skin. His Q ability, Piercing Light, now features heart-shaped projectiles that pierce through his enemies, leaving a trail of love in their wake. His W ability, Ardent Blaze, creates heart-shaped flames that ignite his foes. The ultimate ability, The Culling, showcases a flurry of heart-shaped bullets raining down on his enemies, leaving no doubt that love can be a powerful force.

But what is the story behind Heartseeker Lucian? In the world of League of Legends, Lucian is a relentless and determined gunslinger seeking vengeance against the Shadow Isles. He lost his wife, Senna, to the clutches of Thresh, a sadistic and powerful specter. Lucian's sole purpose is to rid the world of the undead and bring justice to those who have been wronged.

Heartseeker Lucian offers a unique twist to Lucian's story. In this alternate universe, Lucian finds himself caught in a whirlwind of love and passion. Instead of seeking revenge, he becomes a symbol of love and devotion. The Heartseeker skin represents a version of Lucian who has found solace in the power of love, using it to fight against the darkness that threatens to consume the world.

Lucian's strengths lie in his agility and burst damage. With his passive ability, Lightslinger, Lucian can quickly unleash a barrage of attacks, making him a formidable opponent in both short and extended engagements. His mobility is enhanced by his E ability, Relentless Pursuit, allowing him to dash around the battlefield with ease. Additionally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, can decimate multiple enemies from a safe distance, making him a potent force in team fights.

However, Lucian also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to some other marksmen. His reliance on abilities for damage means that he can be vulnerable if his abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, Lucian's short attack range makes positioning crucial, as he needs to be in close proximity to deal damage effectively.

In the world of League of Legends, Lucian has become an iconic champion. His story of love, loss, and vengeance resonates with players, and his gameplay offers a thrilling and dynamic experience. Whether you're a fan of his Heartseeker skin or prefer his classic appearance, Lucian is a champion that demands attention and skill.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Lucian's appearances, including the Heartseeker skin. Explore the different facets of Lucian's story and immerse yourself in the world of League of Legends.

Lucian (Striker Lucian)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: May 28, 2014

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and his dual pistols, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. However, even the most dedicated champions need a break from the battlefield, and that's where Lucian's

skin comes into play.

Released on May 28, 2014, the

skin offers players a fresh and sporty look for the Purifier. This skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier option for those looking to add some flair to their Lucian gameplay.

The Story of Striker Lucian

In the world of League of Legends, skins often provide alternate universes or unique interpretations of the champions.

takes Lucian out of his usual role as a gun-wielding vigilante and places him on the soccer field. This skin transforms Lucian into a professional soccer player, complete with a sleek soccer uniform, cleats, and a soccer ball as his weapon of choice.

Lucian's dual pistols are replaced with a soccer ball that he expertly kicks towards his enemies. The ball leaves a trail of energy as it flies through the air, adding a touch of magic to the sporty theme. Additionally, Lucian's abilities receive visual updates to match the soccer theme, with soccer-themed particles and effects.

Overall, the

skin offers a unique and exciting twist on the traditional Lucian experience. It allows players to embody the spirit of a professional athlete while still harnessing Lucian's deadly skills.

A Brief Narrative of Lucian's Story

Lucian's story within the League of Legends universe is one of tragedy and vengeance. He hails from the region of Demacia, a land known for its strict code of justice. Lucian was once a Sentinel of Light, fighting against the forces of darkness that threatened his homeland.

However, tragedy struck when Lucian's wife, Senna, was captured and corrupted by the Black Mist, a malevolent force that seeks to consume souls. Determined to save his beloved, Lucian embarked on a relentless quest to rid the world of the Black Mist and free Senna from its clutches.

Armed with his twin relic pistols, the Relentless Pursuit and the Lightbringer, Lucian became a formidable force against the undead. He hunts down the creatures of the Black Mist, seeking vengeance for his wife and protecting the innocent from their dark influence.

Lucian's story is one of resilience, determination, and love. He fights not only for justice but also for the memory of his lost love. His unwavering dedication to his cause makes him a fearsome opponent on the battlefield.

Lucian's Strengths and Weaknesses

Lucian's kit is designed to make him a highly mobile and bursty marksman. His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, increasing his damage output. This synergizes well with his Q ability, Piercing Light, which fires a piercing shot that damages all enemies in its path.

Lucian's mobility comes from his E ability, Relentless Pursuit, which allows him to dash a short distance and remove any slowing effects. This ability can be used aggressively to engage or defensively to escape dangerous situations. Additionally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a target direction, dealing massive damage to enemies caught in its path.

However, Lucian does have weaknesses. He is relatively squishy compared to other marksmen, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his reliance on abilities for damage means that he can run out of mana quickly if not managed properly. Lucian players must be mindful of their positioning and resource management to maximize their effectiveness.

Lucian's Place in the Game

Lucian has been a staple pick in the bot lane for many years. His high burst damage and mobility make him a strong laner, capable of punishing opponents who misstep. He excels in short trades and can quickly burst down squishy targets with his combo.

Lucian's versatility also allows him to be played in other roles, such as mid lane or even top lane in certain matchups. His ability to dash in and out of fights makes him a slippery target, and his burst damage can catch opponents off guard.

However, Lucian's popularity has fluctuated over the years due to changes in the meta and balance adjustments. While he may not always be the top pick, Lucian remains a viable and enjoyable champion for players who enjoy high-paced, aggressive gameplay.

Explore Lucian's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Lucian's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. From his classic look to the sporty

skin, there's a style for every player's taste.

Whether you prefer the traditional gunslinger or want to kick it up a notch with the soccer-themed
Lucian offers a thrilling and dynamic gameplay experience. Embrace the power of the Purifier and let justice be your guide on the Fields of Justice.

Lucian (Hired Gun Lucian)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: August 22, 2013

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his dual pistols, he seeks to avenge his wife's death and eradicate the undead scourge that plagues his homeland. As a champion with a rich backstory and a unique playstyle, Lucian has become a fan favorite among players.

One of the many skins available for Lucian is

This skin offers a fresh and stylish look for the Purifier, transforming him into a gunslinger straight out of a western movie. With a sleek black suit, a wide-brimmed hat, and a pair of revolvers, Hired Gun Lucian exudes an air of confidence and danger.

The Hired Gun Lucian skin was released on August 22, 2013, and quickly became a popular choice among players. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a significant visual upgrade to Lucian's base appearance, allowing players to showcase their style while dominating the Rift.

When it comes to the details of the Hired Gun Lucian skin, Riot Games has paid meticulous attention to every aspect. From the intricate design of his suit to the animations of his abilities, this skin truly brings out the essence of a gunslinger. The revolvers are beautifully crafted, and the particles and effects associated with Lucian's abilities have been modified to match the theme of the skin.

Lucian's Q ability, Piercing Light, now fires off bullets with a distinct western flair. The W ability, Ardent Blaze, leaves behind a trail of smoky gunpowder when cast. His E ability, Relentless Pursuit, features a stylish dash animation, making Lucian feel even more like a gunslinger on the move. Finally, Lucian's ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets with a satisfying visual and audio impact.

Now, let's delve into the story of Lucian himself. Born in the city of Demacia, Lucian was a promising young soldier who fell in love with a fellow warrior named Senna. The two were inseparable, fighting side by side against the forces of darkness. However, tragedy struck when Senna was captured and corrupted by Thresh, a sadistic specter from the Shadow Isles.

Determined to save his wife, Lucian embarked on a relentless quest to hunt down Thresh and free Senna from his clutches. Armed with his twin relic pistols, the Relentless Pursuit and the Lightbringer, Lucian became the Purifier, vowing to cleanse the world of the undead menace.

In the game, Lucian is a highly mobile marksman who excels at kiting and dealing sustained damage. His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, making him a formidable threat in team fights. His Q ability, Piercing Light, is a skillshot that damages enemies in a line, while his W ability, Ardent Blaze, reveals and damages enemies in an area.

Lucian's E ability, Relentless Pursuit, allows him to dash a short distance and removes any slowing effects, making him incredibly slippery and difficult to catch. Finally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, allows him to unleash a barrage of bullets in a target direction, dealing massive damage to all enemies in its path.

While Lucian possesses great strengths, he also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His short attack range makes him vulnerable to champions with longer ranges, and his reliance on abilities for damage can leave him mana-hungry in extended engagements. Additionally, Lucian's mobility comes at the cost of lower base stats, making him relatively squishy compared to other marksmen.

Despite these weaknesses, Lucian has found his place in the game as a high-risk, high-reward champion. Skilled players who can effectively manage his abilities and position themselves well in team fights can unleash devastating damage and carry their team to victory.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Lucian's various appearances, including the Hired Gun Lucian skin. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to embrace the gunslinger aesthetic, Lucian offers a thrilling and satisfying gameplay experience that is sure to keep you hooked.

Lucian (Demacia Vice Lucian)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 11, 2019

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and his dual pistols, he has become a symbol of hope for the people of Demacia. However, even heroes need a change of style every now and then, and that's where the

skin comes into play.

Released on July 11, 2019, the

skin offers players a fresh and stylish take on the iconic champion. Inspired by the 80s retro aesthetic, this skin transforms Lucian into a detective straight out of a Miami Vice episode. With his slicked-back hair, neon-lit pistols, and vibrant outfit, Lucian is ready to take on the criminal underworld of Demacia.

The

skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. It offers a significant visual overhaul for the champion, including new animations, sound effects, and voice lines. This skin truly immerses players in the world of 80s detective dramas, adding a touch of nostalgia to their League of Legends experience.

Let's dive into the details of the

skin:

Visual Changes

Lucian's appearance undergoes a complete transformation with the

skin. He trades his traditional armor for a sleek white suit with rolled-up sleeves, showcasing his muscular physique. The suit is adorned with neon accents and a vibrant pink tie, adding a pop of color to his ensemble. Lucian's hair is slicked back, giving him a suave and sophisticated look.

One of the most striking visual changes is the neon lighting on Lucian's pistols. The barrels of his guns glow with a vibrant blue hue, matching the overall aesthetic of the skin. When Lucian fires his abilities, the neon lights intensify, creating a visually stunning effect. The attention to detail in the skin's visual design is impressive, capturing the essence of the 80s era.

Additionally, the

skin features new recall animations, emotes, and special effects. When recalling, Lucian hops onto a hoverboard and glides back to base, showcasing his futuristic detective gadgets. His emotes reflect his confident and charismatic personality, adding an extra layer of immersion to the skin.

Sound Effects and Voice Lines

The audio experience of playing

is just as captivating as the visual changes. The skin introduces new sound effects for Lucian's abilities, enhancing the overall feel of the skin. The gunshots have a distinct 80s-inspired sound, reminiscent of action-packed movies from that era.

Furthermore, Lucian's voice lines receive a makeover to match the detective theme. He adopts a more suave and confident tone, delivering lines that reference classic detective catchphrases. From witty one-liners to determined battle cries, Lucian's voice lines add depth to the skin and further immerse players in the world of

Lucian's Story and Gameplay

Lucian's story in League of Legends is one of tragedy and vengeance. He hails from the city of Demacia, where he served as a Sentinel of Light alongside his wife, Senna. However, their peaceful lives were shattered when Senna was captured and corrupted by Thresh, a malevolent spirit. Determined to free his wife from Thresh's clutches, Lucian embarked on a relentless quest for justice.

In terms of gameplay, Lucian is a highly mobile and aggressive marksman. His dual pistols allow him to rapidly fire shots and dash around the battlefield, making him a formidable force in team fights. Lucian's abilities revolve around his passive, Lightslinger, which allows him to fire additional shots after using an ability. This mechanic rewards players who can effectively chain their abilities together, maximizing their damage output.

Lucian's strengths lie in his ability to quickly burst down enemies and kite them with his mobility. His high damage output and dash abilities make him a potent duelist, capable of outplaying opponents in one-on-one situations. However, Lucian's reliance on his abilities for damage leaves him vulnerable when they are on cooldown. Additionally, his short range compared to other marksmen can make him susceptible to poke and long-range harass.

In the world of League of Legends, Lucian has become an iconic champion, known for his relentless pursuit of justice and his undying love for his wife. His story resonates with players, and his gameplay offers a high-octane and fast-paced experience. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or the stylish

skin, Lucian is a champion worth mastering.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Lucian's appearances, including the
skin. Explore the different facets of this champion and immerse yourself in the world of League of Legends.

Lucian (Strike Paladin Lucian)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 2021

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and vengeance, Lucian has become a symbol of hope for those who have suffered at the hands of the undead. His latest skin, Strike Paladin Lucian, showcases his unwavering dedication to his cause and his mastery of both light and darkness.

Strike Paladin Lucian is a visually stunning skin that transforms Lucian into a holy warrior, clad in gleaming armor and wielding a radiant sword. The skin features intricate details, such as glowing runes etched into the armor and a flowing cape that billows with every movement. The color palette of the skin is predominantly gold and white, symbolizing purity and righteousness.

One of the standout features of Strike Paladin Lucian is the transformation of Lucian's iconic dual pistols, the Relentless Pursuit. In this skin, the pistols are replaced with a single, majestic sword that radiates with divine energy. The sword is adorned with intricate engravings and emits a brilliant light, emphasizing Lucian's role as a beacon of hope in the face of darkness.

In addition to the visual changes, Strike Paladin Lucian also brings new animations and sound effects to the game. Lucian's abilities have been reimagined to match his new paladin theme, with each ability showcasing his mastery of light and his determination to vanquish evil. The sound effects have been enhanced to create a more immersive experience, with the clashing of swords and the crackling of divine energy adding to the intensity of the gameplay.

Now, let's delve into the story of Lucian and how he came to be the Strike Paladin. Lucian's journey began when his wife, Senna, was captured and corrupted by Thresh, the Chain Warden. Determined to free her from her torment, Lucian embarked on a quest to hunt down and destroy every last remnant of the undead. Armed with his twin pistols, he became a relentless force, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

As Lucian's legend grew, so did his connection to the divine. The gods took notice of his unwavering dedication and bestowed upon him the title of Strike Paladin. With this newfound power, Lucian became an even greater threat to the undead, harnessing the forces of light to smite his enemies. His sword, a gift from the gods themselves, became a symbol of his righteousness and his commitment to his cause.

Lucian's strengths lie in his exceptional mobility and burst damage. His ability to dash in and out of fights with his Relentless Pursuit allows him to quickly reposition and evade enemy attacks. Combined with his passive ability, Lightslinger, which allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, Lucian can unleash devastating bursts of damage on his opponents.

However, Lucian also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. His reliance on abilities for damage means that he can be easily shut down if his abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, Lucian's short range puts him at a disadvantage against champions with longer range, as he needs to get up close to deal damage.

In the world of League of Legends, Lucian is a highly popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. His versatility and high skill ceiling make him a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay. With his Strike Paladin skin, Lucian's visual appeal is taken to a whole new level, making him an even more enticing choice for players who want to embody the righteous fury of the Purifier.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Lucian's various appearances, including his base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you prefer the classic look of the Purifier or the divine radiance of Strike Paladin Lucian, there is a skin for every taste and playstyle.

Lucian (PROJECT: Lucian)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: August 1, 2015

PROJECT: Lucian is a futuristic and cybernetic skin for the champion Lucian in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 1, 2015, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP.

The PROJECT skin line in League of Legends features champions who have been transformed into powerful cybernetic beings. These skins depict an alternate universe where technology has taken over, and champions have been enhanced with cybernetic enhancements to become ultimate killing machines.

PROJECT: Lucian showcases Lucian as a sleek and deadly cyborg assassin. His appearance is characterized by a dark and metallic color scheme, with glowing blue accents that highlight his cybernetic enhancements. He wears a futuristic armor suit, complete with a helmet that covers his face, giving him a mysterious and intimidating presence on the battlefield.

The skin also includes unique visual and sound effects, adding to the overall futuristic theme. Lucian's abilities have been modified to match the cybernetic aesthetic, with his auto-attacks and abilities featuring high-tech energy blasts and laser-like projectiles. The ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of energy beams that tear through enemies, leaving a trail of destruction in their wake.

Lucian's PROJECT skin not only offers a visually stunning transformation but also adds an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience. Playing as PROJECT: Lucian allows players to step into the shoes of a futuristic assassin, wielding powerful cybernetic weapons to eliminate their enemies with style.

Lucian's Story

Lucian, also known as the Purifier, is a champion in League of Legends who hails from the Shadow Isles. He is driven by a deep desire for revenge against the undead specter Thresh, who killed his wife, Senna. Lucian wields twin relic pistols, known as the Relentless Pursuit and the Ardent Blaze, which he uses to hunt down and destroy the creatures of the Shadow Isles.

In the game, Lucian is a marksman who excels at dealing sustained damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to dash around the battlefield, quickly repositioning himself to unleash a barrage of bullets on his enemies. Lucian's passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, making him a formidable force in team fights.

Lucian's strengths lie in his high mobility and burst damage potential. His ability to dash in and out of fights makes him difficult to catch, while his relentless gunfire can quickly whittle down the health of his opponents. However, Lucian's reliance on his abilities for damage leaves him vulnerable when his abilities are on cooldown, making him susceptible to crowd control and burst damage.

Throughout his journey, Lucian has encountered various challenges and faced numerous enemies. His determination to avenge his wife has led him to cross paths with other champions in the League of Legends universe, forming alliances and rivalries along the way. His story is one of resilience, sacrifice, and the pursuit of justice in a world consumed by darkness.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Lucian's appearances in the game, including his base skin and other alternate skins. Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to customize their champion's appearance to suit their personal preferences.

Whether you choose to play as the futuristic assassin in PROJECT: Lucian or explore other skins, Lucian offers an exciting and dynamic gameplay experience. Mastering his abilities and utilizing his mobility will allow you to dominate the battlefield and bring justice to the Shadow Isles.

Lucian (High Noon Lucian)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2019

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and vengeance, Lucian has become a fan-favorite champion among players. One of his most iconic skins is the

skin, which adds a touch of the Wild West to his already impressive arsenal.

The

skin transforms Lucian into a gunslinger straight out of a Western movie. With his cowboy hat, duster coat, and dual pistols, Lucian embodies the spirit of the Wild West. This skin is not only visually stunning but also comes with unique animations and sound effects that enhance the overall experience of playing as Lucian.

When it comes to the details of the

skin, every aspect has been carefully crafted to capture the essence of the Wild West. Lucian's model features intricate details on his clothing, including the weathered texture of his duster coat and the ornate engravings on his pistols. The skin also introduces new visual effects for his abilities, such as fiery bullets and smoky trails, which add a touch of flair to his gameplay.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the recall animation. When Lucian recalls, he holsters his pistols and spins them around before drawing them again, showcasing his impressive gun-slinging skills. This attention to detail adds an extra layer of immersion to the skin and makes it a must-have for Lucian enthusiasts.

Now, let's delve into the story of Lucian and his journey in the League of Legends universe. Lucian, originally named Lucian Crownguard, was a Sentinel of Light who fought against the forces of darkness. He was married to Senna, another Sentinel, and together they formed a formidable duo. However, tragedy struck when Senna was captured by Thresh, a sadistic specter who imprisoned her soul within his lantern.

Determined to rescue his beloved wife, Lucian embarked on a relentless quest to hunt down Thresh and free Senna's soul. Armed with his twin relic pistols, the Relentless Pursuit and the Ardent Blaze, Lucian became a force to be reckoned with. He would stop at nothing to avenge Senna and eradicate the darkness that threatened to consume the world.

In the game, Lucian is a highly mobile marksman who excels at dishing out sustained damage. His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability, making him a formidable threat in team fights. His Q ability, Piercing Light, is a skillshot that damages enemies in a line, while his W ability, Ardent Blaze, shoots a projectile that damages and reveals enemies hit.

Lucian's E ability, Relentless Pursuit, allows him to dash a short distance and removes all slowing effects on him. This ability provides him with excellent mobility, allowing him to reposition in fights or escape dangerous situations. Finally, his ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a target direction, damaging all enemies in its path.

While Lucian possesses great strengths, he also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His short attack range makes him vulnerable to champions with longer ranges, and his reliance on abilities for damage can leave him mana-hungry in extended engagements. Additionally, Lucian's mobility comes at the cost of lower base stats, making him relatively squishy compared to other marksmen.

Despite these weaknesses, Lucian has remained a popular pick in the League of Legends meta. His high burst damage and mobility make him a versatile champion who can excel in both solo queue and professional play. With the

skin, players can now experience the thrill of playing as a gunslinging vigilante in the Wild West.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Lucian's various appearances, including the
skin. Whether you're a fan of Lucian's lore or simply enjoy playing him on the Rift, this page is your go-to resource for all things Lucian.

Lucian (Pulsefire Lucian)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: June 3, 2021

Lucian, the Purifier, is a renowned marksman in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless pursuit of justice and his dual pistols, he has become a symbol of vengeance and retribution. Over the years, Lucian has received various skins that showcase his different personas and styles. One of the most notable skins in his collection is

Pulsefire Lucian is a futuristic and cybernetic take on the Purifier. Released on June 3, 2021, this skin immerses Lucian in the high-tech world of the Pulsefire universe. With its sleek design and advanced technology, Pulsefire Lucian offers players a unique and visually stunning experience.

The skin features Lucian donning a futuristic armor suit, complete with glowing blue accents and intricate details. His pistols are transformed into energy weapons, emitting a pulsating blue energy with every shot. The animations and visual effects of Pulsefire Lucian are top-notch, making each ability and attack feel powerful and impactful.

One of the standout features of Pulsefire Lucian is his recall animation. When recalling, Lucian activates a holographic projection of himself, showcasing his cybernetic enhancements. The hologram then merges with the real Lucian, symbolizing his connection to the Pulsefire universe.

As with other Pulsefire skins, Pulsefire Lucian also comes with unique sound effects and voice lines. Lucian's voice is modified to sound more robotic and futuristic, adding to the overall immersion of the skin. The abilities of Pulsefire Lucian also have distinct audio cues, enhancing the gameplay experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Lucian and his place in the League of Legends universe. Lucian, originally known as Lucian Crownguard, was a Sentinel of Light. He fought against the forces of darkness, particularly the undead specter known as Thresh, who had taken his wife's soul. Driven by vengeance, Lucian embarked on a mission to eradicate Thresh and any other supernatural threats.

In the game, Lucian is a ranged marksman who excels at dealing sustained damage. His dual pistols, The Relentless Pursuit and The Lightslinger, allow him to quickly dispatch enemies with a flurry of bullets. Lucian's abilities revolve around his mobility and his ability to chain his attacks together.

His passive ability, Lightslinger, allows him to fire an additional shot after using an ability. This synergizes well with his Q ability, Piercing Light, which fires a piercing shot that damages all enemies in a line. Lucian's W ability, Ardent Blaze, fires a shot that damages enemies and marks them. When Lucian or his allies attack a marked target, they gain movement speed.

Lucian's E ability, Relentless Pursuit, is a dash that allows him to quickly reposition himself in fights. This ability can be used twice in quick succession if an enemy is hit by Lucian's basic attacks or abilities. Finally, Lucian's ultimate ability, The Culling, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a target direction, damaging all enemies in its path.

Lucian's strengths lie in his high mobility, burst damage, and ability to kite enemies. His ability to dash in and out of fights makes him difficult to catch, while his burst damage can quickly eliminate squishy targets. Additionally, Lucian's passive and Q ability allow him to poke enemies from a safe distance.

However, Lucian also has weaknesses that players need to be aware of. He has relatively low health and is vulnerable to crowd control effects. Lucian relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage, so if he is unable to use them effectively, his damage output decreases significantly. Additionally, his short attack range makes him susceptible to champions with longer ranges.

In the world of League of Legends, Lucian has become an iconic champion, known for his relentless pursuit of justice and his unwavering determination. His story of seeking vengeance for his wife's soul has resonated with players, making him a fan-favorite character.

If you want to explore more about Lucian and his various appearances, you can find information and videos on this page. From his classic look to his Pulsefire skin, Lucian offers players a diverse range of styles to choose from. Whether you prefer the futuristic aesthetic of Pulsefire Lucian or the classic look of the Purifier, Lucian's skins are sure to impress.

So, gear up with Pulsefire Lucian and step into the high-tech world of the Pulsefire universe. Unleash your cybernetic power and bring justice to the Rift!
